description: Advanced Unified Endpoint Security Management System

Product_Related_Questions.question: Windows 11 has its own security feature; why should I buy PlanetGuard?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: Windows Defender offers basic protection. However, PlanetGuard-UESM by Velox Solutions offers advanced endpoint protection with multi-layered security, ransomware control, phishing protection, and web security, which are missing in native OS protection. It's like comparing a first aid kit to a full hospital.
Product_Related_Questions.planetguard_feature: Multi-layered endpoint security beyond OS capabilities

Product_Related_Questions.question: We can buy normal antivirus for 200–300—why PlanetGuard?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: Most cheap antiviruses offer only basic scanning. PlanetGuard offers enterprise-level features to individual users: cloud protection, behavioral detection, webcam protection, phishing shields, and zero-day attack prevention—at unmatched value.

Product_Related_Questions.question: I use pirated Windows; then why should I need antivirus?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: Pirated systems are more vulnerable due to missing updates and backdoors. PlanetGuard compensates this weakness, offering real-time protection and exploit prevention, unlike basic or free antivirus tools.

Product_Related_Questions.question: I can download it from Torrent, cracked version?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: Cracked software is often bundled with trojans, spyware, or ransomware. With PlanetGuard, you're protected by a genuine, safe, and trusted platform from a reputable Indian company, Velox Solutions.
Product_Related_Questions.planetguard_integrity: Genuine security solution from trusted developer

Product_Related_Questions.question: What happens if my system is already infected?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: PlanetGuard includes deep-scan and remediation tools to remove existing threats and restore system health, unlike most basic antivirus software that only flags them.

Product_Related_Questions.question: Can I install it over an existing antivirus?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: It's recommended to uninstall the old antivirus to avoid conflict. However, PlanetGuard works seamlessly with firewalls and some non-conflicting tools.

Product_Related_Questions.question: How do I know PlanetGuard is working?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: You'll see real-time notifications, a system tray icon, and a dashboard with active threat monitoring and updates.

Product_Related_Questions.question: Will PlanetGuard auto-renew?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: Yes, auto-renewal is available. You can also opt for manual renewal based on your preference.

Product_Related_Questions.question: Can it be transferred to a new device if I change my laptop/phone?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: No. You can't deactivate the old device and activate on the new one, as the key is registered on mac address of your account.

Product_Related_Questions.question: Will PlanetGuard slow down my computer or phone?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: No. PlanetGuard is lightweight and optimized for performance. It consumes fewer resources than traditional antivirus software.

Product_Related_Questions.question: What happens if I forget to renew or the antivirus expires?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: Real-time protection and updates will stop, leaving your system vulnerable. You'll get renewal reminders before expiry.

Product_Related_Questions.question: Does it protect me from online scams like phishing?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: Yes. PlanetGuard has industry-leading phishing detection that blocks fake websites, emails, and SMS scams in real-time.

Product_Related_Questions.question: Will it clean viruses that are already in my system?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: Yes, its intelligent threat remediation engine detects and removes existing malware, rootkits, and trojans.

Product_Related_Questions.question: Do I have to renew manually every year?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: No, you can enable auto-renewal or set reminders for manual renewal.

Product_Related_Questions.question: Can I transfer the license if I change my laptop?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: No, PlanetGuard licenses are hardware-bound and registered to the MAC address of your device at the time of installation. This ensures better security and prevents misuse. If you change your laptop, a new license will be required. However, you may contact support for special cases like device replacement due to hardware failure.

Product_Related_Questions.question: What's the difference between a virus, malware, and spyware—and how can PlanetGuard protect my system from them?
Product_Related_Questions.answer:
• Virus: A type of malware that attaches itself to files or programs and spreads by infecting other files when executed.
• Malware: A broad category of malicious software designed to harm, exploit, or take unauthorized control of a system. This includes viruses, ransomware, trojans, spyware, and more.
• Spyware: A form of malware that secretly collects your personal or sensitive information without your consent, often to monitor your activities or steal data.

PlanetGuard is not just an antivirus—it's a Unified Endpoint Security Management (UESM) solution that provides comprehensive protection for your entire digital environment:
• Centralized management: PlanetGuard allows you to monitor and control security across all endpoints (computers, mobile devices, servers) from a single platform.
• Threat detection and response: It detects various threats including viruses, malware, and spyware using advanced analytics and behavior monitoring.
• Policy enforcement: Ensures security policies are consistently applied across all devices, reducing vulnerabilities.
• Data protection and compliance: Helps safeguard sensitive data and maintain regulatory compliance.
• Real-time alerts and reporting: Keeps you informed about potential threats and security incidents so you can respond quickly.

Product_Related_Questions.question: Why would someone target my device? I don't have anything important.
Product_Related_Questions.answer: Hackers target anyone for data mining, spam bots, crypto-mining, or financial scams. You don't need to be "important" to be vulnerable.

Product_Related_Questions.question: What if I accidentally click on a scam link or download a fake app?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: PlanetGuard instantly blocks malicious websites and quarantines harmful files to prevent damage.

Product_Related_Questions.question: Should customers check threats manually, or are they shown automatically?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: PlanetGuard runs automated real-time scans. You'll be alerted only when necessary—no need for constant manual checking.

Product_Related_Questions.question: Through PlanetGuard can we remove all threats?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: Yes, PlanetGuard is designed to remove and quarantine 99.9% of known threats and uses AI for emerging threat detection.

Product_Related_Questions.question: Is PlanetGuard-UESM complicated for retail and SME users?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: Not at all. It's simple to use, despite its advanced technology. One dashboard, minimal setup.

Product_Related_Questions.question: Can I install it on Mac?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: No, PlanetGuard is available for Windows.

Product_Related_Questions.question: Are there any system requirements for PlanetGuard-UESM?
Product_Related_Questions.answer:
Yes, basic system specs:
• Windows 10/11
• 2GB RAM
• 500MB space

Product_Related_Questions.question: Does PlanetGuard provide webcam protection and how does it secure from unauthorized access?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: Yes, it includes webcam/mic control, blocking unauthorized access and alerting the user in real time.

Product_Related_Questions.question: If there are four PCs, do I install on all four or just one?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: You need to install on each device.

Product_Related_Questions.question: If the laptop/desktop is hacked after installation, what happens?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: PlanetGuard detects the breach, isolates threats, and assists in recovery—faster and better than most alternatives.

Product_Related_Questions.question: Is there an indication that PlanetGuard is running in the background?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: Yes. You'll see icons, notifications, and scan logs.

Product_Related_Questions.question: Will PlanetGuard stop or alert me if I open a phishing email?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: Yes. It actively scans links and attachments and blocks harmful ones.

Product_Related_Questions.question: If my Facebook/Instagram was hacked before, can PlanetGuard help recover or protect?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: While it cannot recover old hacks, it will prevent future access, protect passwords, and notify you of suspicious behaviour.

Product_Related_Questions.question: Will PlanetGuard stop website Ads?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: It blocks malicious and intrusive ads, though it's not a full ad blocker.

Product_Related_Questions.question: If there is a financial loss due to hacking, does PlanetGuard cover it?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: No antivirus offers insurance, but PlanetGuard minimizes risk. Data protection, secure payments, and anti-keylogging greatly reduce chances of financial fraud.

Product_Related_Questions.question: I'm already using Sophos firewall—what's the difference?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: A firewall filters traffic. PlanetGuard offers complete endpoint security—virus removal, malware protection, phishing guard, app control, etc.

Product_Related_Questions.question: If using a firewall, do I still need PlanetGuard? Why?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: Yes. A firewall is just one layer. PlanetGuard provides 360° protection including everything a firewall doesn't offer.

Product_Related_Questions.question: Can application-level control be applied for user access in PlanetGuard?
Product_Related_Questions.answer: Yes. You can set custom user restrictions for apps and settings.

Market_Related_Questions.question: We are getting cheaper antivirus than yours?
Market_Related_Questions.answer: Cheaper doesn't mean better. PlanetGuard includes premium features found only in high-end software, but at a reasonable price.

Market_Related_Questions.question: What are the margin rates or discounts offered to dealers and customers?
Market_Related_Questions.answer: We offer high-margin structures (15–35%) to dealers and attractive seasonal discounts to end-users.

Market_Related_Questions.question: What will be the rates for distributors?
Market_Related_Questions.answer: Custom pricing with volume-based margins and credit options. Contact our sales team for tiered pricing.

Market_Related_Questions.question: Do we provide one license for multiple users?
Market_Related_Questions.answer: No. Multi-user packs are not available.

Market_Related_Questions.question: What are the modes of payment ?
Market_Related_Questions.answer: All major modes supported: Razorpay , PhonePe, Google Pay, UPI, NetBanking, Debit/Credit Cards.

Market_Related_Questions.question: How many licenses can a dealer buy and are we providing credit?
Market_Related_Questions.answer: Dealers can purchase from 5 to 500+ licenses, with credit terms on approval.

Market_Related_Questions.question: Do you provide any free license if I buy 5 PCs?
Market_Related_Questions.answer: Promotional offers may include 1 extra license on bulk purchases—contact your distributor/sales representative for current deals.

Company_Related_Questions.question: We haven't come across any advertisement of your company.
Company_Related_Questions.answer: Velox Solutions Pvt Ltd is an enterprise-level company with over 13 years of experience in the industry. We have established a strong global presence, serving clients across the US, UK, Dubai, India, and Indonesia. Our focus has always been on delivering high-quality, tailored solutions to enterprise customers rather than mass-market advertising. This approach helps us maintain strong, trusted relationships with our clients worldwide.Velox Solutions believes in direct value marketing and word-of-mouth. We focus more on product strength than flashy ads.

Company_Related_Questions.question: How old is your product in the market?
Company_Related_Questions.answer: PlanetGuard has been in the Indian market for over 13 years, with clients in education, enterprise, and government.

Company_Related_Questions.question: Where is the headquarters of this company?
Company_Related_Questions.answer: Velox Solutions Pvt. Ltd. is headquartered in Our Head Office is located in Vashi, Navi Mumbai. We also have an R&D center in Pune and a development center in Mysuru. In addition to our strong presence across India, Velox Solutions Pvt Ltd operates globally with offices and clients in the UK, US, Dubai, and Indonesia.

Company_Related_Questions.question: Is there any other product of this company in the market?
Company_Related_Questions.answer: Yes! Velox Solutions offers data loss prevention tools, UTM firewalls, and customized enterprise cybersecurity suites.
